title: Slam Dunk (Movie)
alternative_title: Slam Dunk Movie 1, スラムダンク
description: Sakuragi and the Shohoku team takes on Oda and Takezono High School. This is Sakuragi's second match as he faces Oda, a basketball player who went to the same junior high.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Sports>]
